Business is conducted ethically
To reach a sustainable future, every company must seek to anticipate, avoid and address ethical breaches which may arise as a result of its activities.
To achieve this, a company must identify high-risk areas for ethical issues within the business, then provide training and set up control processes to support employees in these high-risk roles.
